TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayModeCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartDisplayModeCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class WebPartDisplayModeCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別設計成包含的集合物件。The class is designed to contain a collection of objects. 它主要供控制來管理集合的物件。It is used primarily by the control to manage collections of objects. 顯示模式是網頁上將它指派為目前的顯示模式時出現的特殊檢視屬性。A display mode is a special view of a Web page that appears when it is assigned as the current display mode on the property. 顯示模式會用於建立，使用者可以執行特殊的工作，例如編輯控制項，或重新整理網頁配置的頁面檢視設定的 Web 組件控制項。Display modes are used in the Web Parts control set to create page views in which users can carry out special tasks, such as editing controls, or rearranging the layout of a page. 控制項定義數種顯示模式，包括， ， ， ，和。The control defines several display modes, including , , , , and . 所參考的顯示模式集合屬性。The collection of display modes is referenced by the property. 任何特定網頁上使用 Web 組件控制項，只有特定顯示模式可用。On any particular Web page that uses Web Parts controls, only certain display modes are available. 預設瀏覽模式和設計模式幾乎永遠可用，但其他的顯示模式是其相對應的區域類型會出現在頁面上，才提供使用。The default browse mode and the design mode are nearly always available, but the other display modes are available only if their corresponding zone types are present on the page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview. 追蹤的控制項與頁面上的可用顯示模式及其屬性。The control keeps track of the available display modes on a page with its property. 這個屬性會參考物件，其中包含所有支援的顯示模式。This property references a object that contains all the supported display modes. 類別沒有公開的建構函式，因此您無法建立您自己的它的新執行個體。The class does not have an exposed constructor, so you cannot create your own new instance of it. 如果您建立自訂物件，並想要在支援的顯示模式集合的一部分控制項，您必須繼承自類別中覆寫方法呼叫基底方法，來建立集合，然後將任何自訂的顯示模式新增至集合中，使用變更其方法。If you create a custom object and want it to be part of the collection of supported display modes in the control, you must inherit from the class, override the method, call the base method to create the collection, and then add any custom display modes to the collection by using its method. 類別有兩個公用屬性。The class has two public properties. 屬性是唯讀的屬性，指出集合是否唯讀。The property is a read-only property that indicates whether the collection is read-only. 多載屬性可讓您存取成員的集合。The overloaded property provides access to the members of the collection. 類別也有數種方法。The class also has several methods. 方法，已經提過，可讓您新增物件加入集合。The method, already mentioned, enables you to add objects to the collection. 方法會判斷集合中是否存在特定顯示模式。The method determines whether a particular display mode exists in the collection. 方法會將集合複製到物件的陣列。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 方法會傳回集合中特定顯示模式的索引。The method returns the index of a particular display mode within the collection. 最後，方法可讓您在集合中的特定索引處插入顯示模式物件。Finally, the method enables you to insert a display mode object at a particular index in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example demonstrates working with the class. 重點是，您必須繼承自類別並覆寫來新增自訂方法物件所建立的集合控制項。The key point is that you must inherit from the class and override the method to add a custom object to the collection created by the control. 此程式碼範例包含五個部分：This code example has five parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 裝載其他控制項的網頁。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 使用者控制項位於網頁上的區域，並可讓您輸入，並在標籤中顯示的文字。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個控制項。A source code file that contains two controls. 其中一個是自訂控制項，另一個是自訂来加入至頁面的預設顯示模式物件。One is a custom control; the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works. 原始碼的程式碼範例，可讓您變更顯示模式的使用者控制項的第一個部分是來自另一個主題。The source code for the first part of the code example, the user control that lets you change display modes, comes from another topic. 對於此程式碼範例正常運作，您需要取得使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 在 Web 組件頁面上的變更顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在此程式碼範例中的.aspx 頁面與相同的資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含兩個控制項，使用者控制項和自訂控制項。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 請注意`Register`在頁面頂端的指示詞參考的使用者控制項和編譯控制項的命名空間。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是輸入和顯示文字的使用者控制項。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 請注意，它會使用控制項來建立多個檢視的使用者介面 (UI)。Notice that it uses a control to create multiple views of the user interface (UI). 按鈕，另一個則不會顯示一個檢視。One view is displayed with the button, the other without. 請注意，在 覆寫`OnPreRender`方法中，程式碼會檢查以查看網頁目前是否在自訂的顯示模式，以及因此，它會顯示第一個使用者控制項，其中包含按鈕的檢視。Notice that the in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode, and if so, it displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果頁面不是自訂的顯示模式 （例如，如果頁面是在瀏覽 或 設計 模式中），則會隱藏按鈕。If the page is not in the custom display mode (for example, if the page is in browse or design mode), the button is hidden. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 此範例的第四個部分是兩個自訂類別的原始程式檔。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 請注意，自訂類別會覆寫方法，會呼叫基底方法，將所有的預設顯示模式，，，然後新增自訂的顯示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自訂的顯示模式類別`InLineEditDisplayMode`，只要繼承自管理員、 設定的顯示模式名稱的建構函式，並會覆寫一些基底屬性，以建立自訂的顯示特性。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要執行的程式碼範例，請瀏覽器頁面載入。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 請注意，頁面目前是在瀏覽 模式中，與任何按鈕是可見的。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，變更頁面，即可**內嵌編輯顯示**模式中，並請注意，現在 [] 按鈕會顯示在下方的使用者控制項。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the button is visible in the lower user control. 新增一些文字，然後按一下按鈕來更新控制項。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 請注意，若要瀏覽模式，會傳回頁面顯示，現在會顯示您所輸入的文字，因為頁面不是自訂的顯示模式，會再次隱藏按鈕。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is not in the custom display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法，以加入新物件的現有物件。You can use the method to add new objects to an existing object. 舉例來說，在其中您可以這樣的案例是當您建立自訂類別，而您想要將它新增至頁面上的 支援的顯示模式的集合。An example of a scenario in which you would do this is when you create a custom class, and you want to add it to the collection of supported display modes on a page. 若要這樣做，您必須繼承自類別並覆寫其方法，先呼叫基底方法，並接著使用方法將自訂的顯示模式新增至集合。To do that, you must inherit from the class and override its method, first calling the base method, and then using the method to add the custom display mode to the collection. ## Examples 此程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。This code example demonstrates the use of the class. 針對完整的程式碼和指示，才能執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下列程式碼區段，就會發生在衍生類別會覆寫方法並將自訂的顯示模式新增至集合。The following section of code occurs in a derived class that overrides the method and adds a custom display mode to the collection. [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個物件，您必須知道相對於其他的一個物件的序數位置 （索引）。The method is useful if you have multiple objects, and you need to know the ordinal position (the index) of one object relative to the others.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等於然後集合中的項目數`value`附加至集合結尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值從內部變更 Web 組件控制項集合，它會變更在不同時間點集合的內容。The property value is changed internally by the Web Parts control set as it changes the contents of the collection at different points. 例如後,控制項已加入支援所有顯示模式，以其集合，它在內部設定為唯讀，以防止它正在變更的物件。For example, after the control has added all supported display modes to its collection, it internally sets the object to read-only to prevent it from being changed. > [!NOTE] > 沒有任何機制變更這個屬性值從您的程式碼，雖然您可以讀取其值。There is no mechanism to change this property value from your code, although you can read its value.

summary.span: 根據索引或唯一識別項，取得集合的特定成員。

span.span: Gets a specific member of the collection according to its index or a unique identifier.
